results.title: Basic Instinct
results.overview: A police detective is in charge of the investigation of a brutal murder, in which a beautiful and seductive woman could be involved.

results.title: Basic Instinct 2
results.overview: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

results.title: Between the Sheets: A Look Inside 'Basic Instinct 2'
results.original_title: Between the Sheets: A Look Inside 'Basic Instinct 2'

results.title: Blonde Poison: The Making of 'Basic Instinct'
results.original_title: Blonde Poison: The Making of 'Basic Instinct'
results.overview: A look behind the scenes at one of the more controversial thillers of the 90's, and the one that made Sharon Stone a top-name star. Includes interviews with Stone and footage of some of the hard work that went into making the movie, as well as some discussion of the problems the makers had to deal with, including protests from groups who wanted the film changed or simply abandoned.
